message:
What do you think of such a blockchain solution?
What do you suggest be the next step?

data.message: Excuse my naivete but what's the point of this solution? I mean, sure, the election system and transparency/etc is great in theory, but how is any of this in any way enforceable? Once you elect a leader for the street, neighborhood, etc what do they actually do?

Why are you starting so big (an alternative to state elections) ?. Facebook were first made for students in a university, First google server case were made with lego!.
 I think you should start small, take a small community of people, try the system, enhance the idea and if it succeeds with this small group you get wider and expand. But don't plan for world domination while you are still 2 poeple :). 
And I think it is a nice idea for a small community of people

Mina W. Gerges
بص كده مثلا على الفكرة دي (بعيدا موضوع الفقة الاسلامي والبوستات والفيديو)
بص على الحل المطروح مباشرةً... وقولي رأيك ؛)
